title: Ground News - Brigitte Bardot against Islam: 'I don't want to die in Muslim France'
text:
Summary by ilgiornale.it Already accused of Islamophobia in the past, the transalpine actress returns to office: “An authoritarian government would be needed. Woke culture? Ridiculous fashion.” Then the lunge on feminists Share menu More
